list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("free") AS "value" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("available_percent") AS "value" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT 100-mean(usage_idle) as "cpu%"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(usage_idle) as "idle", mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_free) as "free", mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used_percent) as used FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("requests"),1s) AS "requests" FROM "nginx" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("handled"),1s) AS "handled" FROM "nginx" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("accepts"),1s) AS "accepts" FROM "nginx" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("reading"),1s) AS "reading" FROM "nginx" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("writing"),1s) AS "writing" FROM "nginx" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("active"),1s) AS "active" FROM "nginx" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("waiting"),1s) AS "waiting" FROM "nginx" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT mean("process_count") as "processes", mean("max") as "max-pool-size" FROM "passenger" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "passenger_process" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("cpu") FROM "passenger_process" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("real_memory") FROM "passenger_process" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("sessions") FROM "passenger_process" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("processed") FROM "passenger_process" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("uptime_in_millis") FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT mean("cpu_percent")  FROM "elasticsearch_process" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT mean("mem_heap_used_percent")  FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT mean("threads_count") AS "count", mean("threads_peak_count") AS "peak count"  FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*

SELECT mean("mem_heap_max_in_bytes") AS "max", mean("mem_heap_commited_in_bytes") AS "commited", mean("mem_heap_used_in_bytes") AS "used" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),*
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "rx" FROM "elasticsearch_transport" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "tx" FROM "elasticsearch_transport" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("fielddata_estimated_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "fielddata-estimated" FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("parent_estimated_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "parent-estimated" FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("fielddata_limit_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "fielddata-limit" FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("parent_limit_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "parent-limit" FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("request_estimated_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "request-estimated" FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("request_limit_size_in_bytes"), 1s) AS "request-limit" FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("fielddata_overhead") AS "fielddata-overhead",mean("parent_overhead") AS "parent-overhead", mean("request_overhead") AS "request-overhead",mean("fielddata_tripped") AS "fielddata-tripped",mean("parent_tripped") AS "parent-tripped",mean("request_tripped") AS "request-tripped" FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("total_free_in_bytes") AS "free",mean("total_available_in_bytes") AS "available",mean("total_total_in_bytes") AS "total" FROM "elasticsearch_fs" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("query_cache_memory_size_in_bytes") AS "query-cache",mean("fielddata_memory_size_in_bytes") AS "fielddata",mean("request_cache_memory_size_in_bytes") AS "request-cache",mean("percolate_memory_size_in_bytes") AS "percolate" FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("merges_total_size_in_bytes") AS "total",mean("merges_current_size_in_bytes") AS "current" FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("store_size_in_bytes") AS "store-size" FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(merges_total_time_in_millis) AS "merges-total",mean(flush_total_time_in_millis) AS "flush-total",mean(get_exists_time_in_millis) AS "get-exists",mean(get_missing_time_in_millis) AS "get-missing",mean(get_time_in_millis) AS "get",mean(indexing_delete_time_in_millis) AS "indexing-delete",mean(indexing_index_time_in_millis) AS "indexing-index",mean(indexing_throttle_time_in_millis) AS "indexing-throttle",mean(merges_total_stopped_time_in_millis) AS "merges-total-stopped",mean(merges_total_throttled_time_in_millis) AS "merges-total-throttled",mean(merges_total_time_in_millis) AS "merges-total",mean(percolate_time_in_millis) AS "percolate",mean(recovery_throttle_time_in_millis) AS "recovery-throttle",mean(refresh_total_time_in_millis) AS "refresh-total",mean(search_fetch_time_in_millis) AS "search-fetch",mean(search_query_time_in_millis) AS "search-query",mean(search_scroll_time_in_millis) AS "search-scroll",mean(store_throttle_time_in_millis) AS "store-throttle",mean(suggest_time_in_millis) AS "suggest",mean(warmer_total_time_in_millis) AS "warmer-total" FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(flush_total) as "flush",mean(get_exists_total) as "get-exists",mean(get_missing_total) as "get-missing",mean(get_total) as "get",mean(indexing_delete_total) as "indexing-delete",mean(indexing_index_total) as "indexing-index",mean(indexing_noop_update_total) as "indexing-noop-update",mean(merges_total) as "merges",mean(percolate_total) as "percolate",mean(refresh_total) as "refresh",mean(search_fetch_total) as "search-fetch",mean(search_query_total) as "search-query",mean(search_scroll_total) as "search-scroll",mean(suggest_total) as "suggest",mean(warmer_total) as "warmer"FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(get_current) as "get",mean(indexing_delete_current) as "indexing-delete",mean(indexing_index_current) as "indexing-index",mean(merges_current) as "merges",mean(percolate_current) as "percolate",mean(search_fetch_current) as "search-fetch",mean(search_query_current) as "search-query",mean(search_scroll_current) as "search-scroll",mean(suggest_current) as "suggest",mean(warmer_current) as "warmer" FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("query_cache_total_count") AS "total",mean("query_cache_miss_count") AS "miss",mean("query_cache_cache_count") AS "cache",mean("query_cache_hit_count") AS "hit" FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("docs_count") AS "count",mean("docs_deleted") AS "deleted" FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("buffer_pools_mapped_used_in_bytes") AS "used",mean("buffer_pools_mapped_total_capacity_in_bytes") AS "total-capacity" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("buffer_pools_direct_used_in_bytes") AS "used",mean("buffer_pools_direct_total_capacity_in_bytes") AS "total-capacity" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("buffer_pools_mapped_count") AS "count" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("buffer_pools_direct_count") AS "count" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("gc_collectors_young_collection_count") AS "young",mean("gc_collectors_old_collection_count") AS "old" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("gc_collectors_young_collection_time_in_millis") AS "young",mean("gc_collectors_old_collection_time_in_millis") AS "old" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("mem_pools_old_peak_used_in_bytes") AS "peak-used",mean("mem_pools_old_peak_max_in_bytes") AS "peak-max",mean("mem_pools_old_used_in_bytes") AS "used",mean("mem_pools_old_max_in_bytes") AS "max" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("mem_pools_young_peak_used_in_bytes") AS "peak-used",mean("mem_pools_young_peak_max_in_bytes") AS "peak-max",mean("mem_pools_young_used_in_bytes") AS "used",mean("mem_pools_young_max_in_bytes") AS "max" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_xa_commit")) AS "commit" FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_xa_end")) AS "end" FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_xa_recover")) AS "recover" FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_xa_prepare")) AS "prepare" FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_xa_rollback")) AS "rollback" FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_xa_start")) AS "start" FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT mean("open_file_descriptors") AS "fd-open" FROM "elasticsearch_process" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bulk_completed")) AS "completed" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bulk_threads")) AS "threads" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bulk_rejected")) AS "rejected" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bulk_queue")) AS "queue" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bulk_largest")) AS "largest" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bulk_active")) AS "active" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("refresh_active")) AS "active" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("warmer_active")) AS "active" FROM "elasticsearch_thread_pool" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
